description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. A woman searches the ruins of a Roman Temple for the legend of the Mind's Eye of Jupiter, a hidden portal to another time. Download episode one of this 3D sci-fi adventure game.
